name: Minnie Mouse
appearance: Mouse with bow, dress, big round ears
guessing_clues: Wears a bow and dress, big mouse ears, best friends with Mickey, kind and cheerful, loves fashion, often seen smiling, classic Disney character, helps friends in adventures.

name: Donald Duck
appearance: White duck, sailor shirt, sailor hat
guessing_clues: White duck wearing sailor outfit, talks with a quacky voice, gets angry easily, best friends with Mickey and Goofy, often unlucky but brave, loves adventures and jokes.

name: Daisy Duck
appearance: White duck, bow, cute outfit, long eyelashes

name: Goofy

guessing_clues: Tall clumsy friend, wears green hat, laughs a lot, friendly and kind, sometimes trips and falls, best buddies with Mickey and Donald, always tries to help.

name: Pluto
appearance: Yellow dog with green collar
guessing_clues: Yellow dog with a collar, doesn’t talk, loves playing and chasing, loyal pet of Mickey, wags tail a lot, barks to communicate, adorable and energetic.

name: Elsa
appearance: Blonde braid, blue dress, ice magic glow
guessing_clues: Has ice powers, makes snow and castles, blonde hair, wears blue dress, sings about letting go, queen of Arendelle, protects her sister, loves winter and magic.

name: Anna
appearance: Auburn hair, colorful dress, warm smile
guessing_clues: Brave princess, auburn hair, loves her sister Elsa, goes on a snowy journey, friendly and silly, falls and gets up again, loves chocolate, helps save her kingdom.

name: Olaf

guessing_clues: Talking snowman, carrot nose, loves warm hugs, dreams of summer, funny jokes, made from magic, friendly and sweet, helps Elsa and Anna on adventures.

name: Kristoff
appearance: Blond hair, winter clothes, boots

name: Sven
appearance: Reindeer with antlers, friendly face
guessing_clues: Reindeer with antlers, best friend of Kristoff, loves carrots, makes funny sounds, helps pull sled, brave in snow, loyal and gentle, part of Frozen adventures.

name: Hans
appearance: Prince outfit, neat hair, charming smile
guessing_clues: Looks kind at first, prince from another kingdom, pretends to help Anna, secretly selfish, causes trouble in Arendelle, tries to take the throne, villain in Frozen.

name: Marshmallow

name: Oaken
appearance: Big smile, warm clothes, shopkeeper
guessing_clues: Runs a shop in the snow, friendly and silly, offers warm clothes, loves sauna jokes, speaks with funny voice, appears briefly but memorable in Frozen.

name: Snow White
appearance: Black hair, red bow, yellow skirt, blue top
guessing_clues: Princess with red bow, friends with forest animals, sings happily, runs away to a cottage, meets seven dwarfs, eats a poisoned apple, classic fairy tale story.
game: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

appearance: Dwarf with glasses, leader look
